subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Cheating
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Harvard’s co-captains withdrew last fall in order to preserve their eligibility during an investigation into a cheating scandal. They say they’re happy for the team, which won on Thursday.
snippet: Harvard’s co-captains withdrew last fall in order to preserve their eligibility during an investigation into a cheating scandal. They say they’re happy for the team, which won on Thursday.
